reasoning.explanation: Risk assessment indicates a High risk level (score: 68.0/100). The primary risk drivers are Weather Disruption Risk (45.5%), Port Congestion Risk (31.8%), and Carrier Reliability Risk (22.7%). Climate conditions contribute 45.5% to overall risk, indicating significant weather-related disruption potential. Port congestion and operational factors contribute 31.8% to overall risk. Carrier reliability concerns contribute 22.7% to overall risk.
